customFields.Priority P1 to P4: P2 - Core Functions (Do core functions work?)
customFields.Update notes: Linda 10 June 2022: Running in Cypress, but still included in a RF test, so if RF needs refactoring, this test case won't be in the list of test cases to comment on after refactoring.

inline.description:
:[character]+TAB
--------------------
1. In a test channel, begin typing :[emoji] so that the autocomplete list appears.
2. Use down arrow to move down the list to an [emoji] and hit TAB
inline.expectedResult: :[emoji]: is added to the message box
